name: predict_v1.sh
description: A script for predicting brain images using registration

inputs.description: Target image for registration (exvivo or invivo [default])
inputs.name: Registration Template

inputs.description: Don't use inflated surface as initial registration (backward compatibility)
inputs.name: Inflated Surface Flag

inputs.description: Hemisphere (rh or lh) default is both hemispheres
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Print mode (do not run commands, just print them)
inputs.name: Print Mode Flag

author: FreeSurfer Developers
